entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is having a nightmare about Voldemort. (Excerpt: 'Harry kept waking in the night...')

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The antagonist of the story, who is mentioned as being remembered by Harry. (Excerpt: 'remembering his livid face, his wide, mad eyes ...')

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Harry's cousin, who is teasing him about not having any birthday cards. (Excerpt: 'I know what day it is,' sang Dudley...)

relationships.description: Harry remembers Voldemort's face and eyes, indicating that he has a traumatic experience with him. (Excerpt: 'remembering his livid face, his wide, mad eyes ...')
Harry and Dudley are cousins, as indicated by the text. (Excerpt: 'Dudley... your cousin')
Harry has a traumatic experience with Voldemort, which is hinted at in the story. (Excerpt: 'weeks later, Harry kept waking in the night...')
Dudley teases Harry about not having any birthday cards, indicating that he is bullying him. (Excerpt: 'Haven't you even got friends at that freak place?')
